profile.profileDescription: MODS 3.6 installation profile built in Fall 2017 for SUNY Maritime.

label.name_singular: In copyright - rights-holder(s) unlocatable or unidentifiable
label.name_plural: In copyright - rights-holder(s) unlocatable or unidentifiable

label.name_singular: No copyright - other known legal restrictions
label.name_plural: No copyright - other known legal restrictions

label.name_singular: CC0 No Rights Reserved - Public Domain
label.name_plural: CC0 No Rights Reserved - Public Domain

label.name: language
label.description: language comprises language term and script term

label.name: form
label.description: Attributes: authority (see: http://www.loc.gov/standards/sourcelist/genre-form.html); authorityURI; valueURI; type (Examples: material, technique)

label.name: digitalOrigin
label.description: born digital, reformatted digital, digitized microfilm, digitized other analog

label.name: identifier
label.description: suggested values: hdl, doi, isbn, isrc, ismn, issn, issue number, istc, lccn, local, matrix number, music publisher, music plate, sici, uri, upc, videorecording identifier, stock number

label.name: originInfo
label.description: Suggested values: production, publication, distribution, manufacture

label.name: accessCondition
label.description: suggested values: restriction on access; use and reproduction

label.name: part
label.description: suggested values: volume, issue, chapter, section, paragraph, track

label.name: date
label.description: encoding: w3cdtf, iso8601, marc, edtf, temper

label.name: recordCreationDate
label.description: encoding: w3cdtf, iso8601, marc, edtf, temper

label.name: recordChangeDate
label.description: encoding: w3cdtf, iso8601, marc, edtf, temper

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

settings.setting: The identification of the person who performed a specific examination, including his or her name, role or title, and institutional affiliation. Example: Klein, Peter (conservator, Ordinariat fr Holzbiologie, Universitt Hamburg, (Hamburg, Germany))
